page.title: 15Medical Sevices in N Tregony
page.content: There are three doctors and one dentist located within this D-block. The branch doctor's surgery is open all weekdays except Tuesday and has four doctor's surgeries and three doctors.Its catchment area covers mainly the whole of Roseland Peninsular and there are about four thousand patients.A lot of the people in the area are retired and Cornish but newcomers are always entering the area.The only nursing home nearby is at Portscatho which is 12.5 km away by road.A dentist has just moved into the area.He is open all weekdays and has about one thousand five hundred patients in the book. Nursing services are administered from St. Austell hospital.There are two types of nurse;a Macmillan nurse who looks after dying people in their homes and there are health visitors.
